NazgulComponentFactory - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.impl.nazgul.analyzer
Nazgul-flavoured ComponentFactory implementation, which uses the nazgul/templates directory as the root storage directory for all templates.

NazgulNamingStrategy - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.impl.nazgul.analyzer
Nazgul-style NamingStrategy implementation, based on the AbstractNamingStrategy.
NazgulNamingStrategy() - Constructor for class se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.impl.nazgul.analyzer.NazgulNamingStrategy
Default constructor creating a NazgulNamingStrategy which requires that no prefixes should be placed on folders within the project reactor, and that all artifactIDs should use the prefix NAZGUL_PREFIX.
